pgsql.migration.learn.more.prerequisites: Learn more about things you need before starting a migration.
pgsql.migration.dashboard.title: Azure PostgreSQL migration
pgsql.migration.dashboard.description: Determine the migration readiness of PostgreSQL Server instances by analyzing the Server and Databases compatibility and provide a recommended Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible server target. Migration Capability of PostgreSQL Server instance to Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible server will be available in future.
pgsql.migration.feedback.issue.title: Feedback on the PostgreSQL assessment experience
pgsql.migration.pre.req.title: Things you need before starting your Azure  PostgreSQL migration:
pgsql.migration.pre.req.2: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible server
pgsql.migration.dashboard.help.title: Help articles and video links
pgsql.migration.dashboard.assessment.tas: Assess PostgreSQL database for Migration Readiness
Migrate PostgreSQL to Azure DB for PostgreSQL online using DMS via the Azure portal
A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a PostgreSQL Server instance to Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible servers with minimal downtime.
pgsql.migration.dashboard.simplifying.mi: Simplifying migrations to Azure Database for PostgreSQL
This video discusses the benefits of Azure Database for PostgreSQL and options available to migrate your PostgreSQL workloads to Azure Database for PostgreSQL.
pgsql.migration.dashboard.help.link.dmsG: PostgreSQL assessment in Azure Data Studio
pgsql.migration.dashboard.help.descripti: Provide end-to-end assessment experience with right-sized target recommendations for Azure Database for PostgreSQL using the Azure PostgreSQL migration extension in Azure Data Studio.
pgsql.migration.tab.button.support.label: Help & Support
pgsql.migration.select.database.to.conti: Please select 1 or more databases to assess for migration
pgsql.migration.database.assessment.desc: Select Database(s) you want to assess for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible server.
Select the json file with assessment parameters
pgsql.migration.assessment.parameter.pag: For performing assessment, upload the JSON file with additional parameters containing information about - Connection Pooling, Customer Managed Keys and Read Replica. Also, Azure SKU recommendation requires performance metrics data of PostgreSQL Server instance like Core, CPU Memory and Storage to determine SKU.

pgsql.migration.assessment.in.progress.c:
We are assessing the databases in your PostgreSQL Server instance {0}.

This may take some time.
pgsql.migration.assessment.parameter.inf: SKU Recommendation for target requires performance data of PostgreSQL Server instance. Select automatic data collection or provide the data parameters manually.
pgsql.migration.choosecollection.informa: Choose how you want to provide assessment feature and performance data parameters
Azure SKU recommendation requires performance metrics of PostgreSQL Server instance like Memory, vCores, Storage, and IOPS to determine the rightsized SKU.
pgsql.migration.storage.information.text: Total storage used for a PostgreSQL Server instance. Enter value in GB.
pgsql.migration.memory.information.text: Total memory used for a PostgreSQL Server instance. Enter value in GB.
pgsql.migration.iops.information.text: Input/Output operations per second by the PostgreSQL Server instance.
Performance multiplier to cover scenario such as seasonal usage, future usage. Applied to Memory, vCores, Storage, and IOPS.
pgsql.migration.migration.readiness.head: Migration Readiness of assessed databases in the Server Instance
pgsql.migration.data.collection.descript: Performance data collection status and possible values are - In Progress, Completed, Stopped for automatic collection and Not Applicable Â for manual collection.
pgsql.migration.windows.automatic.collec: Windows Error: Automatic Collection is not supported on Windows, please enter the performance data parameters manually.
pgsql.migration.mac.automatic.collection: Mac Error: Automatic Collection is not supported on Mac, please enter the performance data parameters manually.
pgsql.migration.input.information.text: Azure SKU Input requires recommendation metrics data of PostgreSQL server instance like scale factor to determine the right-sized SKU.
pgsql.migration.choosecollectiontype.inf: Choose how you want to provide assessment performance data parameters
pgsql.migration.linux.automatic.collecti: Automatic collection for PostgreSQL instances is not supported below version 11.
pgsql.migration.permission.automatic.col: Automatic collection requires user to be a superuser or have access to both pg_read_server_files role and pg_read_file function.

pgsql.migration.time.duration.informatio: Time duration for collecting performance data.
pgsql.migration.automatic.collection.inf: It is recommended to perform the assessment data collection during peak workload time and data collection duration should be 24 hours. The assessment wizard needs to be open while the data collection is in progress. {0}
pgsql.migration.ready.with.conditions.fo: {0} Database(s) Ready with conditions for Migration
pgsql.assessment.sku.cycle.complete.text: SKU recommendation will be displayed once data collection for first cycle is complete.
pgsql.migration.confidence.rating.descri: The confidence rating is based on a 24 hrs. duration e.g., a 5-star rating is for more than 19 hours, and a 1-star rating is for more than 10 minutes.
pgsql.migration.version.16.and.above.err: Assessment cannot be initiated, Source PostgreSQL version 16 and above is not supported in Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible server
pgsql.migration.percentile.utilization.i: Percentile value of the performance sample used for right sizing.
pgsql.assessment.tbu: Gets updated after first cycle is completed.
